/usr/lib64/openmpi/bin/mpic++    -std=c99 -g -O0 -g -O0    CMakeFiles/example_num_frames.dir/example_num_frames.c.o  -o example_num_frames -rdynamic ../../src/clib/libpioc.a ../../src/gptl/libgptl.a ../../tools/adios2pio-nm/libadios2pio-nm-lib.a /home/tkurc/codar/acme/pnetcdf/lib/libpnetcdf.a /home/tkurc/codar/adios-install/lib/libadios.a -lpthread -lm
